article_title: University of Kentucky hospital wants state approval to add 120 beds
article_text: If the request is approved, the number of beds at UK's Chandler Hospital would increase 14.5 percent, to 945. Dr. Michael Karpf, vice president for health services, said Monday he was confident the state would give its approval.

article_summary:
Dr. Michael Karpf, vice president for health services, said Monday he was confident the state would give its approval.
If the request is approved, the number of beds at UK's Chandler Hospital would increase 14.5 percent, to 945.
